file-mapping.src/calculator.py: contains the main logic and classes for the calculator functionality, including operations and history management
file-mapping.tests/test_calculator.py: contains unit tests for the calculator functionalities, including edge cases like division by zero
file-mapping.docs/README.md: contains information about the project, how to install and use the calculator application
file-mapping.src/interfaces.py: contains interface definitions for user input and output formatting
file-mapping.run_calculator.py: contains a script to initialize and run the calculator application from the command line
